root.body: shr dilut loss 31 ct vs profit 17 ct net loss 2,806,005 vs profit 1,513,395 rev 15.0 mln vs 10.4 mln avg shr dilut 8,982,754 vs 8,804,899 note current year includ loss 3.4 mln dlr takeov defens expens also includ loss 1.8 mln dlr vs 332,000 dlr equiti limit partnership
